name: Biking Full day - HCM to Vung Tau Beach
description: History: During 14th and 15th centuries, the cape that would become Vũng Tàu was a swamp which European trading ships visited regularly. The ships’ activities inspired the name Vũng Tàu, which means “anchorage”. The Portuguese navigators passed Vũng Tàu many times and named it after Saint Jacques(disambiguation needed). The French invaded Vietnam afterwards and called it Cape Saint Jacques. The cliff of Vũng Tàu is now called Mũi Nghinh Phong (literally meaning “Cape of breeze welcome”).
